dublinCore.dc:title: 119 HR 2960 IH: To amend title III of the Public Health Service Act to reauthorize the program of payments to childrens hospitals that operate graduate medical education programs.
dublinCore.dc:rights: Pursuant to Title 17 Section 105 of the United States Code, this file is not subject to copyright protection and is in the public domain.

action.action-desc: Ms. Schrier introduced the following bill; which was referred to the Committee on Energy and Commerce

form.official-title: To amend title III of the Public Health Service Act to reauthorize the program of payments to childrens hospitals that operate graduate medical education programs.

section.header: Program of payments to children’s hospitals that operate graduate medical education programs
section.text: Section 340E of the Public Health Service Act (42 U.S.C. 256e) is amended—

paragraph.text: in subsection (a), by striking 2023 and inserting 2030; and

subparagraph.text: in paragraph (1)(A)(vi), by striking 2023 and inserting 2030; and
in paragraph (2)(F), by striking 2023 and inserting 2030.
